p: Methods: We evaluated 2341 patients admitted in ICU during the period from Jan 2014 to Oct 2015. It was an observational study which was assessed retrospectively, the data of all adults patients admitted in ICU (excluding terminals). We separated in two groups: (1) With some oncologic disease (2) Without oncologic disease. After the division of the groups they were analyzed in comparison to each other in age, sex, SAPS3 severity score, ICU and hospital length stay, final outcome in the ICU and hospital. Data were collected from Epimed System and the MV system, tabulated in Excel and studied statistically.
